    • Method Detail

      • getAllDates

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getAllDates​()
        Lists out all files available in the data repository.
        Returns:
        List of strings of format "yyyy-MM-dd.txt" to be parsed in the page as json message

      • getRateByDate

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getRateByDate​(java.lang.String date)
        Returns exchange rates for all currencies for a given date
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        Returns:
        If date is valid and data is available, the method returns a list of objects(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message list. Otherwise return error message.

      • getSpecificRateByDate

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecificRateByDate​(java.lang.String date,
                                                              java.lang.String currencyOfInterest)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message.

      • getSpecificRateByDate

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecificRateByDate​(java.lang.String date,
                                                              java.lang.String currencyOfInterest,
                                                              java.lang.String referenceCurrency)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date using a specified reference currency (non-USD included).
        Parameters:
        date - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        referenceCurrency - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest,referenceCurrency is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message. Error message to be returned if currencyOfInterest==referenceCurrency.

      • getSpecifiedRatesByCurrency

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getSpecifiedRatesByCurrency​(java.lang.String currencyOfInterest,
                                                                    java.lang.String start,
                                                                    java.lang.String end)
        Returns exchange rates for a specified currency for a given date
        Parameters:
        start - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        end - of "yyyy-MM-dd" format
        currencyOfInterest - of "XXX" format - case sensitive
        Returns:
        If date, currencyOfInterest is valid and data is available, the method returns an object(date, currencyOfInterest, referenceCurrency, exchangeRate) to be parsed as json message. Otherwise return error message.
